bug.author: trungnt13
bug.summary: Cannot import CudnnRNN from contrib.cudnn_rnn in 1.0.1
bug.description: For some reason all the "init.py" in python directory of contrib.cudnn_rnn have been removed, and it is impossible to import anything from there.

comments.comment: Just an update, I have a fix for this, but am still working on getting it in.
